|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201L; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = VxWorks; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 6-pin header,, populated,, JP3,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, internal,, 14-pin header,, populated,, JP2 |specialfeat = |flags = DOCSIS 1.0 |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = b |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/2002 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = |rad1chip1cpu = |rad1chip1 = |rad1chip2 = |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "KMA320010903", "TANSUI-A", "PCX V:X3", and a date code of '''0245''' is silkscreened on one PCX2500's board. It's presumed to be running VxWorks. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.haxorware.com/forums/showthread.php?tid=525 ''Toshiba pcx2500'' thread @ the '''Haxorware''' Forums] :The board image shown ([http://haxorware.com/forums/thread-88.html from here]) has a different layout than the one populating this entry ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
1 [3.3] (GND) 2
3 (TxD) (GND) 4
5 (RxD) (GND) 6  JP3
